response.original_title: Beyond the Headlines: The NABJ Journey
response.overview: Since its inception, the National Association of Black Journalists (NABJ)  has been a pivotal organization in providing career development opportunities for Black journalists, students, and communications professionals globally. As a leading advocate for Black media professionals, NABJ has ensured that its members have a voice in the global news media landscape. On the eve of NABJ's 50th anniversary, this film tells the story of the courageous 44 founders and enduring impact theyâ€™ve had on the media profession.
response.title: Beyond the Headlines: The NABJ Journey
